text: Sierpc is a city in Poland in the Masovian Voivodeship. About 18,872 people live there. The area is 18,6 kmÂ². The football club there is called Kasztelan Sierpc. == Other websites == *Official town webpage *Map via mapa.szukacz.pl *Open air museum in Sierpc - photo Category:Cities in Masovian Voivodeship
